name: BATTLE BOX (Orun)
description:
Insane 4 player, competitive multiplayer battle royale with a variety of deadly weapons.  

Grab chests to get pistols, shotguns, machine guns, rockets, grenades, mines, swords, bullets that bounce off walls and goat cannons. 

Created by team: Survival Not Guaranteed

Keys were setup for use with a controller to key mapper.  We used Enjoy2 (Mac) to setup controller support during the jam. Tutorial for setting it up here.
